subject: Baseball
Italian Language
Coaches and Managers
World Baseball Classic
lead_paragraph: A work in progress at their best and hapless at their worst, the team representing Italy at the World Baseball Classic has offered Mike Piazza a taste of coaching — albeit in a foreign language.
snippet: A work in progress at their best and hapless at their worst, the team representing Italy at the World Baseball Classic has offered Mike Piazza a taste of coaching — albeit in a foreign language.
